name: Skully(itch)
description:
Skully is a digital halloween decoration for greeting trick-or-treaters!!
Control this digital puppet with your PC's gamepad!Set him up in a window (maybe with a projector!)Then hide out of sight and give him your best spooky voice!
Please note, an Xbox gamepad is required. (Other gamepads might work; I haven't tried!) Also, this program only provides the visuals; if you want to amplify your voice, you'll have to handle that yourself.
Skully was once an Xbox Live Indie Games project, but now that XBLIG is offline, I've made it available here on Itch!
